scripts.dev: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=development node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3000
scripts.dev:prod: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3000
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=development node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && next build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production node src/scripts/generateConfig.ts && next build
